item.title: PI Adding XP to dungeoneering skill
item.dc:creator: @InfectedWhore InfectedWhore
item.description:
@InfectedWhore wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { c.getPA().addSkillXP[SKILLID] == XP; }

If that doesn’t work, it’s not too dissimilar. I had to do this for a new skill I made once.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Adding XP to dungeoneering skill
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve been trying to code a little dungeoneering minigame were when the npc dies you get a ceritan amount of points, and you can use these points to buy gear
All i need to know now is, how do i make it give out xp to a new skill? My skill id im trying to use is 22 if someone could please help me that would be great

(I wanna make it give xp after the npc is dead)

Here is what i have for when the npc dies if its anyhelp :\

//Dungeoneering public void handledungdeaths(int i) { Client c = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].spawnedBy]; c.sendMessage("You gain 5 dungeoneering points"); c.pkPoints += 5; }

And this is where the npc id is handles

				[code]//handles dung npc
						if (npcs[i].npcType == 10409) {
						handledungdeaths(i);
					}[/code]

Read full topic
